Title: Udta Punjab
Writer: Sudip Sharma (screenplay), Abhishek Chaubey (screenplay), Sudip Sharma (dialogue)
Actors: Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Kareena Kapoor, Diljit Dosanjh
Plot: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.
